name: Pete's Dragon VHS (2001) – Disney Gold Collection
description:
Relive the magic of Disney’s classic tale with this 2001 Gold Collection Edition VHS of Pete’s Dragon. Originally conceived in 1957 as a two-part episode for the Disneyland television series, the project was shelved and later revived as a feature film in 1975. Filming commenced in July 1976, with locations including a specially constructed lighthouse set in Morro Bay, California, and soundstages at Disney Studios in Burbank. The film premiered on November 3, 1977, blending live-action and animation to tell the heartwarming story of a young orphan, Pete, and his invisible dragon friend, Elliott. Featuring memorable performances by Helen Reddy and Mickey Rooney, this family-friendly musical adventure remains a nostalgic addition to any collection.

---

One-of-a-kind. Pete's Dragon VHS Movie Vintage Walt Disney Gold Classic Collection Edition. Used Good+ condition.

Case is Average condition for age. Art and tape in excellent condition.

Tape was verified and plays well.

Price Includes Shipping and IL Sales Tax.

Available for pickup at store, and same day local delivery in Richmond via Door Dash/Uber.
